ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Circuitscape Input Files
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: This .zip includes two folders of Circuitscape input files: BP for the Bruce Peninsula, and EGB for eastern Georgian Bay. Res_x files are the resistance surfaces used to calculate pairwise resistances in Circuitscape and correspond to the models described in Table 1 of the main text. Please contact michelle.dileo@gmail.com for focal points input files.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Landscape Genetics
Reptiles
Conservation Genetics
